text: @paulsperry_ @realDonaldTrump No Coronavirus police. Hence their have been protesters, Beach goer's, Trump rallies, packed bar goer's etc. And their will be 4th of July gatherings. And regardless of those who criticize who ever. All will lead to more coronavirus cases, hospitalization's and deaths..
